description: This module is a basic introduction to commutative and homological algebra. It covers the following topics: prime spectrum of a commutative ring, exact sequences, projective, injective and flat modules, Ext and Tor, integral ring extensions, Noetherâs normalization and Hilbertâs Nullstellensatz, Noetherian and Artinian rings and moduels, dimension theory, Dedekind domains and discrete valuation ring.
title: Graduate Algebra IIA
